typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Unnamed: 0} as string,
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		{Loan Amt} as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> csvSource
source(output(
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		LoanAmt as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> parquetSource
source(output(
		{Unnamed: 0} as string,
		Loan_ID as string,
		Gender as string,
		Marital as string,
		Dependents as string,
		Education as string,
		SelfEmplo as string,
		ApplIncome as string,
		CoApplIncome as string,
		{Loan Amt} as string,
		Term as string,
		CreditHistory as string,
		PropArea as string,
		LoanStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> cosmosSource
parquetSource select(mapColumn(
		Loan_ID,
		Gender,
		Marital,
		Dependents,
		Education,
		SelfEmplo,
		ApplIncome,
		CoApplIncome,
		{Loan Amt} = LoanAmt,
		Term,
		CreditHistory,
		PropArea,
		LoanStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> parquetSelect
csvSelect, parquetSelect union(byName: true)~> Union
Union aggregate(groupBy(Loan_ID),
	each(match(name!='Loan_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates sort(asc(Loan_ID, true)) ~> Sort1
csvSource select(mapColumn(
		Loan_ID,
		Gender,
		Marital,
		Dependents,
		Education,
		SelfEmplo,
		ApplIncome,
		CoApplIncome,
		{Loan Amt},
		Term,
		CreditHistory,
		PropArea,
		LoanStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> csvSelect
Select2 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select3 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select4 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
cosmosSource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SqlSink
